thread.title: Miguel

author: Miguel
title: Miguel
text: Just over a year ago, I changed my property management company and decided to appoint Nelson Alexander and Nikolas Psevdos. It was the best decision I have made in regards to my property. Any problems, he deals with it immediately and with minimum fuss and hassle for me. Wealth of knowledge and easy to deal with. Most importantly he organised a lot of tenants who are now taking care of my property at a good rental rate. Thatâ€™s exactly what you want when you appoint a property manager. Very happy with my service!
